page.title: 16COUNTY STORES, CROSS HOUSES
page.content: {The Challinor family}own and run{The {County Stores (Salop) Ltd.}This is a general grocery store, a sub Post Office, a BP/National petrol filling station, and a taxi service. 3 full time and 3 part time people work here. The{grocery}has 605 customers weekly and a delivery service is provided. Opening hours are 9-5.30 weekdays, 9-noon Saturdays. As a{news agengy, 2424 daily and evening newspapers and 263 magazines are delivered weekly. The{sub Post Office}deals with stamps, pensions, payments, as well as being a Girobank. 1200 cars call each week at the 2{self-service petrol pumps.}The kiosk shop has 3090 customers weekly and sells ices, confectionery, papers and goods for motorists. Toilets are provided. The business relies upon the passing trade as well as the local people.
